My Work

Rock, Paper, Scissors

This is my version of the classic game Rock, Paper, Scissors! I created this application to familiarize myself with React hooks.

  • React
  • React Hooks
  • Responsive Mobile Layout

Clean Desktop Layout


  • Clean desktop layout for playing at home!
  • Built in scoreboard.
  • Shows the winning and losing choices each round.

Responsive Mobile layout


  • Convenient mobile layout for when you need to play on the go!
  • Utilizes CSS grid templates to easily relocate components.
